entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Langley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:03 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 except southeast 60 gusting to 80 near the water late this morning and early this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
